hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) granted a concession to pregnant women who fear for themselves, allowing them not to fast, and to nursing mothers who fear for their infants.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِفْطَارِ لِلْحَامِلِ وَالْمُرْضِعِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning pregnant and nursing women breaking their fast
